sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>soul</radical> <radical>long ago</radical> was very <kanji>frugal</kanji>, which is why you get to have too much in this life!
meaningInfo: Thank you soul, for being frugal so that I can have so much now.
readingMnemonic: You know what being <kanji>frugal</kanji> is? <reading>Sexy</reading> (<ja>せき</ja>). You save money, you use less resources, that's the sexiest thing I can think of.
readingInfo: If you want your spouse or S.O. to think you're more sexy, just be more frugal. They'll definitely appreciate it and see you in a different light.
